PLAY.TITLE: The Tragedy of King Richard the Second

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.PERSONA: JOHN OF GAUNT, Duke of Lancaster
EDMUND OF LANGLEY, Duke of York

PERSONAE.PERSONA: HENRY, surnamed BOLINGBROKE, Duke of Hereford
son to John of Gaunt; afterwards King Henry IV.
DUKE OF AUMERLE, son to the Duke of York.
HENRY PERCY, surnamed HOTSPUR, his son.
Captain of a band of Welshmen.
Lords, Heralds, Officers, Soldiers, two Gardeners, Keeper, Messenger, Groom, and other Attendants.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. KING RICHARD II's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING RICHARD II, JOHN OF GAUNT, with other
Nobles and Attendants
Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE and THOMAS MOWBRAY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The DUKE OF LANCASTER'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter JOHN OF GAUNT with DUCHESS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The lists at Coventry.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the Lord Marshal and the DUKE OF AUMERLE

The trumpets sound, and KING RICHARD enters with
his nobles, JOHN OF GAUNT, BUSHY, BAGOT, GREEN, and
others. When they are set, enter THOMAS MOWBRAY in
arms, defendant, with a Herald

The trumpets sound. Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE,
appellant, in armour, with a Herald
Flourish. Exeunt KING RICHARD II and train

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The court.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING RICHARD II, with BAGOT and GREEN at one
door; and the DUKE OF AUMERLE at another

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Ely House.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING RICHARD II and QUEEN, DUKE OF AUMERLE,
BUSHY, GREEN, BAGOT, LORD ROSS, and LORD
WILLOUGHBY
Exit, borne off by his Attendants

Flourish. Exeunt KING RICHARD II, QUEEN, DUKE OF
AUMERLE, BUSHY, GREEN, and BAGOT

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt DUKE OF YORK and QUEEN

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Wilds in Gloucestershire.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE and NORTHUMBERLAND, with Forces
Enter LORD ROSS and LORD WILLOUGHBY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A camp in Wales.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter EARL OF SALISBURY and a Welsh Captain

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Bristol. Before the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE, DUKE OF YORK,
NORTHUMBERLAND, LORD ROSS, HENRY PERCY, LORD
WILLOUGHBY, with BUSHY and GREEN, prisoners

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HENRY BOLINGBROKE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Exeunt NORTHUMBERLAND and others, with the
prisoners

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The coast of Wales. A castle in view.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Drums; flourish and colours. Enter KING RICHARD
II, the BISHOP OF CARLISLE, DUKE OF AUMERLE, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Wales. Before Flint castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, with drum and colours, HENRY BOLINGBROKE,
DUKE OF YORK, NORTHUMBERLAND, Attendants, and forces

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HENRY BOLINGBROKE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Parle without, and answer within. Then a flourish.
Enter on the walls, KING RICHARD II, the BISHOP OF
CARLISLE, DUKE OF AUMERLE, SIR STEPHEN SCROOP, and
EARL OF SALISBURY

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING RICHARD and his attendants below

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. LANGLEY. The DUKE OF YORK's garden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the QUEEN and two Ladies

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUEEN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter a Gardener, and two Servants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Westminster Hall.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, as to the Parliament, HENRY BOLINGBROKE,
DUKE OF AUMERLE, NORTHUMBERLAND, HENRY PERCY, LORD
FITZWATER, DUKE OF SURREY, the BISHOP OF CARLISLE,
the Abbot Of Westminster, and another Lord, Herald,
Officers, and BAGOT

Re-enter DUKE OF YORK, with KING RICHARD II, and
Officers bearing the regalia

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING RICHARD II
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Dashes the glass against the ground

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt KING RICHARD II, some Lords, and a Guard

Exeunt all except the BISHOP OF CARLISLE, the Abbot
of Westminster, and DUKE OF AUMERLE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. A street leading to the Tower.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUEEN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter KING RICHARD II and Guard

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The DUKE OF YORK's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE OF YORK and DUCHESS OF YORK

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DUKE OF YORK
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: He plucks it out of his bosom and reads it

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A royal palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE, HENRY PERCY, and other Lords

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Pomfret castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter a Groom of the Stable

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING RICHARD II
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Snatching an axe from a Servant and killing him
He kills another. Then Exton strikes him down

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Windsor castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter HENRY BOLINGBROKE, DUKE OF YORK,
with other Lords, and Attendants
Enter HENRY PERCY, and the BISHOP OF CARLISLE
Enter EXTON, with persons bearing a coffin
